A Home in Every Port.description:
Prerequisites Charisma 16

You have a reputation in towns and villages you’ve visited, and residents are always willing to open their doors to you.

When in a town or village, during downtime, you can spend 8 hours to locate a resident willing to provide lodging for you and up to six allies for up to 24 hours at no charge. The standard of living within the acquired lodging is comfortable, and square meals are provided at no cost.

After 24 hours, you must pay standard prices for further lodging and meals or use this feat again to find a new resident willing to host you.

Aboleth Transmutation.description: You have tapped into the ancient magic used by alghollthu masters (also known as aboleths) to mold the flesh of your ancestors. You can use this magic to transfigure other beings. You gain 3rd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.RvBlSIJmxiqfCpR9]{Feet to Fins} and 2nd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.MZGkMsPBztFN0pUO]{Water Breathing} as arcane innate spells. You can cast each of these arcane innate spells once per day.

prerequisites.value: Você não é imune a doenças ou venenos

Accursed Clay Fist.name: Punho de Barro Amaldiçoado
Accursed Clay Fist.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XATPzPTZ9Je89erT]{Golem Enxertado}

Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Golem Enxertado, especialista em ataques desarmados

Você substituiu um de seus antebraços por um feito de barro e infundiu magia arcana amaldiçoada. Quando você faz um Golpe desarmado punho de barro e acerta, seu alvo sofre -2 de penalidade de estado nos testes de resistência contra efeitos de maldição por 1 hora.

Especial O dado de dano para seu punho de barro é 1d8 e perde os traços ágil e acuidade normal do punho.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse)

Accursed Magic.description: When the curse within you spills out, you can lay curses on others and claim them for yourself with ease. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5OcZ3HBkrRFhSWCz]{Claim Curse}. At 10th level, you can also cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gfKhtVsXF3HKSdmY]{Seal Fate}, and at 12th level, you can also cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8THDHP0UC7SgOYYF]{Inevitable Disaster}. You can cast these spells once per day as occult innate spells, but only while within your curse maelstrom state. If you couldn't already cast occult spells, these spells use Wisdom as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.

Accursed Touch.description: You've learned to harness the supernatural curse that animates you, imbuing your most powerful attacks with a terrible curse. When you critically hit with a fist Strike, negative energy binds to it; this is a curse and a disease. The creature takes [[/r 2d6[persistent,negative]]] damage. While the creature has this persistent damage, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}. The persistent damage increases to 3d6 at 14th level and 4d6 at 20th level. This is a critical specialization effect.

Achaekek's Grip.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6RjilN93bgy34y3H]{Basic Red Mantis Magic}

You sense if a creature you have slain in the last year has been restored to life, as long as you and that creature are on the same plane. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IT1aaqDBAISlHDUV]{Achaekek's Clutch} focus spell. If you don’t already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by praying to Achaekek or researching your assigned kill.

Acute Vision.name: Visão Aguçada
Acute Vision.description: Quando estiver em fúria, seus sentidos visuais se aprimoram e o concedem visão no escuro.

Additional Companion.name: Companheiro Adicional
Additional Companion.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wdmUH6hdat7jpEWt]{Beastmaster Dedication}

Another animal joins you in your travels. It is a young animal companion that has the minion trait. See Beastmaster Animal Companions (in Beastmaster Dedication) for rules on how having multiple animal companions works.

Special You can select this feat more than once, gaining an additional animal companion each time, to a maximum of four total companions (including the one you gained from Beastmaster Dedication and possibly one you gained from sources other than the beastmaster archetype).

Adrenaline Rush.name: Ímpeto de Adrenalina
Adrenaline Rush.description:
In the heat of battle, you are capable of amazing feats of strength.

While you are @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Raging}, increase your encumbered and maximum Bulk limits by 2; you also gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks to lift heavy objects, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}, and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{Force Open}.

Advanced Blood Potency.name: Potência Sanguínea Avançada
Advanced Blood Potency.description:
Pré-requisitos Potência Sanguínea Básica

Você recebe um talento de feiticeiro. Para o propósito de atender seus pré-requisitos, seu nível de feiticeiro é igual à metade de seu nível de personagem.

Especial Você pode selecionar este talento várias vezes. Cada vez que o fizer, você recebe outro talento de feiticeiro.

Advanced Concoction.name: Concocção Avançada
Advanced Concoction.description:
Pré-requisitos Concocção Básica

Você recebe um talento de alquimista. Para o propósito de atender seus pré-requisitos, seu nível de alquimista é igual à metade de seu nível de personagem.

Especial Você pode selecionar este talento várias vezes. Cada vez que o fizer, você recebe outro talento de alquimista.

Advanced Deduction.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X0NFLIn1bqj6bnd0]{Basic Deduction}

You gain one investigator feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your investigator level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another investigator feat.

Advanced Flair.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sE7x3QAel4VGdkgn]{Basic Flair}

You gain one swashbuckler feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your swashbuckler level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another swashbuckler feat.

Advanced Fury.name: Furor Avançado
Advanced Fury.description:
Pré-requisitos Furor Básico

Você recebe um talento de bárbaro. Para o propósito de atender seus pré-requisitos, seu nível de bárbaro é igual à metade de seu nível de personagem.

Especial Você pode selecionar este talento várias vezes. Cada vez que o fizer, você recebe outro talento de bárbaro.

Advanced Hallowed Spell.description:
You dig deeper into the magical tools found in wizard schools and divine domains. You gain an advanced focus spell, either the necromancer advanced school spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zvvHOQV78WKUB33l]{Life Siphon} or the advanced domain spell of the death domain, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.J5MNC4xq3CHH31qT]{Eradicate Undeath}. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. If you choose life siphon, it triggers when you expend spell slots from your class even if they aren't wizard spell slots.

Special You can select this feat a second time, choosing the other advanced focus spell.

Advanced Kata.name: Kata Avançado
Advanced Kata.description:
Pré-requisitos Kata Básico

Você recebe um talento de monge. Para o propósito de atender seus pré-requisitos, seu nível de monge é igual à metade de seu nível de personagem.

Especial Você pode selecionar este talento várias vezes. Cada vez que o fizer, você recebe outro talento de monge.

Advanced Mysteries.description:
Prerequisites Basic Mysteries

You gain one oracle feat. For meeting its prerequisites, your oracle level is equal to half your level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time, you gain another oracle feat.

Aerobatics Mastery.description:
Prerequisites Master in Acrobatics

You move with grace in flight and can perform amazing aerial stunts.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{Maneuver in Flight} and can combine two maneuvers into a single action, such as reversing direction while making a steep ascent or descent or hovering in gale-force winds. The DC of the Acrobatics check is equal to the DC of the most difficult maneuver + 5.

If you’re legendary in Acrobatics, you can combine three such maneuvers into a single action; the DC of the Acrobatics check is equal to the DC of the most difficult maneuver + 10. Regardless of the combination, these maneuvers rarely allow you to move farther than your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly} Speed.

Alkenstar Agent Dedication.description:
Access You have been initiated by the grand duchess of Alkenstar or one of her agents.

You put on the persona of a rough and tumble outlaw, but your real goals are to report threats to Alkenstar back to the grand duchess. You become an expert in Deception and trained in your choice of Underworld Lore or Legal Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Lie To Me} skill feat.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.ttkG4geKXTao5pku]{Alkenstar Agent} archetype.

All of the Animal.description: You know how to make the best and most efficient use of a hunted animal's carcass. Choose a Large or larger corpse of an animal that died within the past day. While using Survival to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{Subsist} near the carcass, you always receive enough food for yourself and one additional Medium creature, using up the meat from the carcass to do so. Since you're using all of the animal, others can't use the carcass's meat for any other purpose, including their own use of All of the Animal.

Alter Ego Dedication.description:
You make yourself into a living mirror, becoming a double of someone unremarkable, and you slip into exactly the role that can get you past security or into a sensitive facility. You become an expert in Deception. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.lAvEK4yNL3Y7pVmr]{Assume a Role} activity.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.HZHzpATOyhTjUDrR]{Alter Ego} archetype.

Always Ready.description: Extensive training against undead has taught you to cover your weak points, even when you think that you're alone. You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, or flanking undead of your level or lower. However, the undead can still help their allies flank. If all of your opponents are undead, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls; the GM determines whether to apply this bonus if undead are disguised as another type of creature, if another type of creature is disguised as undead, or if there are additional opponents you haven't noticed who aren't undead.

Ambushing Knockdown.description:
Access Side with the Washboard Dogs in the gang conflict.

Requirements You're wielding a melee weapon that deals bludgeoning damage and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by an enemy.

You emerge from hiding and deliver a blow that can knock an enemy sprawling to the ground. You Stride up to half your Speed, but you must end your movement next to a foe you're hidden from or undetected by. You then Strike that enemy with the required weapon; if you hit, the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Analyze Idiolect.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.u6SDVWbzHnBBPNMo]{Linguist Dedication}, expert in Deception and Society

You break down a specific individual’s idiolect, memorizing their speech mannerisms and habits.

If you interact with someone for at least 10 minutes, when you later attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} that individual, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your Deception checks and DCs. Due to the intense character study required, you can’t remember more than one idiolect at a time.

Anarchic Arcana.description:
The magic in your blood is unpredictable. When you make your daily preparations, roll [[/r 1d12]] twice and consult the following list:

  1. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow};
  2. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.3JG1t3T4mWn6vTke]{Blur};
  3. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tlSE7Ly8vi1Dgddv]{Hideous Laughter};
  4. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form};
  5. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2oH5IufzdESuYxat]{Illusory Object};
  6. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image};
  7. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy};
  8. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility};
  9. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter};
  10. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzLkNU3AAqOSKFPR]{Sound Burst};
  11. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5KobTMrZeZxuXMgl]{Spider Climb};
  12. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mrDi3v933gsmnw25]{Telekinetic Maneuver}.

You can cast each of those two spells once during the following day (or one spell twice if you rolled doubles) as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

Angel of Vindication.description:
Requirements Your mark is an undead creature.

To aid with your mission of destroying undead, you've specialized in techniques to destroy them, much as other assassins learn to kill the living. When you Strike a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} undead foe with a weapon that has the backstabber weapon trait, you deal 3 extra precision damage instead of 1. If the weapon is a +3 weapon, you deal 6 extra precision damage instead of 2. If you have the Angel of Death feat, your attacks also instantly destroy undead at 0 Hit Points, and attempts for the undead to rejuvenate-such as via a lich's soul cage or a ghost's rejuvenation ability-fail unless the effect's counteract level is higher than half your level when you killed the creature (rounded up), or originates from an artifact or deity. Finally, if you have the Assassinate feat and an undead mark critically fails its save against your Assassinate, it is destroyed.

Animal Trainer Dedication.description:
You gain the services of a young animal companion that travels with you and obeys simple commands as best as it can. This trained animal is trained in Performance instead of the skill listed for its type.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.bL5cccuvnP5h7Bnn]{Animal Trainer} archetype.

Animate Net.description: When you cast animate rope, you can modify its target to be 1 net. If you do, replace the spell's standard effects with the following: You cause a net to animate and throw itself at a Medium or smaller creature within 20 feet of the net. Attempt a spell attack roll against the target's Reflex DC. On a success, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes; on a critical success, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes. The Escape DC is equal to your spell DC as long as the spell lasts. Once the spell ends, the Escape DC returns to the normal DC for a net (usually 16), and a creature adjacent to the target can Interact to remove the net.

Apex Companion.name: Companheiro em Ápice
Apex Companion.description:
Pré-requisitos Companheiro Animal

Você pode invocar a essência de cada animal individual de uma espécie em particular para transformar temporariamente seu animal em um exemplar desse tipo. Você aprende a magia de ordem companheiro em ápice. Aumente o número de pontos de foco em seu reserva de foco em 1.

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 6)

Arcane Sensitivity.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6b8DiNx4c1zPZ7RP]{Edgewatch Detective Dedication}

You can sense the presence of the supernatural, even if you don't have any magical ability yourself. You can spend a single action (this action has the concentrate trait) to determine if any magical auras are present in the area. This has the effects of a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} spell but isn't magical. By straining, you can also discover the source of the magic and its school (with the effect of a 4th-level detect magic spell), but doing so prevents you from using this ability again until you've rested for 8 hours.

Arcane Sight.description: You've trained yourself to constantly be on the lookout for magical effects, even when focusing on looking out for other things. When you are Searching, you also gain the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Yb0C1uLzeHrVLl7a]{Detect Magic} unless you choose not to.

Archaeologist's Luck.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You fail a check against a trap, such as a Thievery check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable} the trap or a Reflex save to avoid its effects.

You are more than just skillful; your drive to find the secrets of the past manifests as a strange kind of luck. Reroll the failed check and use the new result.

Archer's Aim.name: Mira do Arqueiro
Archer's Aim.description: You slow down, focus, and take a careful shot. Make a ranged Strike with a weapon in the bow weapon group. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition. If the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, reduce the flat check from being hidden from 11 to 5.

Arise, Ye Worthy!.description: You are descended from the valkyries who protect worthy souls, and can hold back death's grasp. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{Breath of Life} as a divine innate spell once per day.

Armor Assist.description:
Prerequisites trained in Athletics or Warfare Lore

After your service aiding armored combatants, you are practiced in helping yourself and others don heavy gear.

You can attempt an Athletics or Warfare Lore check with a DC determined by the GM (but usually 15 for common armor, DC 20 for uncommon armor, and DC 25 for rare armor) to halve the time you take to don armor.

You can halve an ally’s time to don armor by working with them to don the armor and succeeding at an Athletics or Warfare Lore check against the same DC.

Armor Rune Shifter.name: Alterador de Runas de Armadura
Armor Rune Shifter.description:
Arquétipo Guarda dos Cristais

Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Guarda dos Cristais

Você aprende os segredos das runas de armaduras observando-as por gemas e pode alterá-las à seu critério. Uma vez por dia, quando estiver fazendo suas preparações diárias, você pode focar na energia magia de uma runa através das facetas de um cristal para alterar uma única propriedade de uma runa em uma armadura que você possua suprimindo seus efeitos normais e fazendo-a funcionar como uma runa de propriedade diferente. Você pode alterar temporariamente uma runa para as seguintes propriedades: deslumbrante, fortificação, resistente a energia, invisibilidade, sombras ou escorregadia. A propriedade da runa se mantém alterada até que você faça as suas próximas preparações diárias. A armadura deve atender aos pré-requisitos da runa temporária, e quaisquer outras runas que precisem da runa suprimida para funcionarem permanecem suprimidas também enquanto ela estiver transformada. A runa estará, obviamente, alterada, portanto não pode ser vendida como se fosse uma armadura com a runa temporária.

Armored Rebuff.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8foxmfC6FFT3oYpV]{Sentinel Dedication}

Trigger An adjacent foe critically fails an attack roll to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} you with a melee weapon or unarmed attack.

Requirements You are wearing medium armor or heavier.

You rebuff puny attacks with your armor, knocking back your foe. Attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the triggering foe, even if you don’t have a hand free. If you succeed, you can’t @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} to follow the foe, as you’re knocking the foe back with the rebounded attack, not by physically moving towards them.

Armored Stealth.description:
Prerequisites expert in Stealth

You have learned techniques to adjust and modify your armor and movements to reduce the noise you make.

When you wear non-noisy armor with which you are trained, your penalty to Stealth checks is reduced by 1 (to a minimum penalty of 0). If you’re a master in Stealth, reduce the penalty by 2, and if you’re legendary, reduce the penalty by 3.

If your armor has the noisy trait, instead of reducing the penalty to Stealth checks, you ignore the effects of the noisy trait, enabling you to remove the penalty with a sufficient Strength score as normal.

As in Life, So in Death.description: Specific memories of your old life are hard to hold onto, but you know things without remembering why. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ihN8gkHSdPG9Trte]{Adopted Ancestry} feat. You can choose any ancestry, but it is likely to be one that matches both your skeleton heritage and who you were in life. As long as your body is completely covered by armor or clothing, you do not have to attempt Deception checks against a creature's Perception DC to successfully Impersonate yourself as a member of that ancestry. This is a non-magical disguise that doesn't protect against divination. This disguise doesn't provide any benefit against a creature actively attempting a Perception check against you.

Ashen Veil.description: By smearing ash or tainted earth over your skin and armor, you shroud yourself from the dead. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to undead using vision or lifesense, allowing you to Hide and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} without other sources of cover or concealment. This effect lasts only as long as you continue to take no actions other than to Hide, Sneak, or other surreptitious actions. The GM determines which actions end the effect, but attacking, casting spells, activating items, and the like always do.

Assured Identification.description:
Prerequisites expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion

You rarely misidentify an item. When using Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion checks to Identify Magic, if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead. If you would misidentify a cursed item because you roll a success but not a critical success (Gamemastery Guide 90), you simply can’t identify it instead.

Astral Tether.description: You spin out a thread of psychic energy that connects you to an ally, using it as a conduit for your abilities. Choose a willing creature within 60 feet and connect to it. Whenever you would gain a benefit from a psychic amp, you can have the amp affect the tethered creature instead. You can do so only if the amp grants a distinct benefit, not if it alters the amped spell. The tether can't be severed physically but breaks if the distance between you and the tethered ally ever exceeds 60 feet, if you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, or if you use Astral Tether again.

Automatic Writing.description:
Frequency once per day

When confronted with the unknown, you can receive knowledge beyond your own experience via written messages delivered by your hand. You spend 10 minutes seated while holding a writing utensil, using it to make small circular motions as you open your mind to the forces around you. You receive information as your hand writes on its own, guided by spirits. At the end of these 10 minutes, Recall Knowledge with any Lore skill in which you are not trained, using your Occultism modifier instead of your modifier with that skill. The strain of this spirit channeling leaves you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for the next 10 minutes.

Axe Climber.name: Escalador de Machado
Axe Climber.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Lenhador de Turpin Rowe} Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Lenahdor de Turpin Rowe

Quando você está escalando uma superfície de madeira e tem uma @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Machadinha} ou @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Machado de Batalha} em cada mão, você tem uma velocidade de escalada igual à metade da sua velocidade normal. Você ainda deve ter as duas pernas disponíveis para escalar e não pode usar nenhum dos machados em combate durante a escalada. Esse talento também pode ser usado para escalar uma superfície de gelo se você tiver uma @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RbM4HvPyrZ4YJxRc]{Picareta Leve} em cada mão.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse)

Axe Thrower.name: Atirador de Machado
Axe Thrower.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Lenhador de Turpin Rowe} Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Lenahdor de Turpin Rowe

Você dominou o peso e o equilíbrio de uma variedade de machados e pode arremessá-los com facilidade. Qualquer arma de machado de uma mão que você use tem a característica arremesso com um alcance de 3 metros. Para machados que já possuem a característica arremesso, o alcance aumenta em 3 metros. Quando você tiver sucesso crítico em uma jogada de ataque com uma arma de machado arremessada, aplica o efeito de especialização crítica do machado.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse)

Azarketi Weapon Aptitude.description: You become familiar with using your weapons both in and out of water. Whenever you critically hit using an azarketi weapon or one of the weapons listed in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.WUMnFrehmFbj2PIm]{Azarketi Weapon Familiarity}, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Azarketi Weapon Expertise.description: Your mastery with weapons both above and below water is unmatched. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.62nnVQvGhoVLLl2K]{Crossbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XyA6PKV46aNlLXOd]{Hand Crossbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aXuJh4i8HqSu6NYV]{Longspears}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spears}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FJrsDoaIXksVjld9]{Tridents}, and all azarketi weapons in which you are trained.

Azarketi Weapon Familiarity.description:
You are familiar with weapons that excel underwater. You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.62nnVQvGhoVLLl2K]{Crossbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XyA6PKV46aNlLXOd]{Hand Crossbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aXuJh4i8HqSu6NYV]{Longspears}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spears}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FJrsDoaIXksVjld9]{Tridents}.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon azarketi weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial azarketi weapons are simple weapons and advanced azarketi weapons are martial weapons

Banishing Blow.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aM6eAeyk5twmxCKe]{Fiendsbane Oath} Trigger You use your champion's reaction, triggered by a fiend within your reach.

The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks. You attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the fiend that triggered your champion's reaction; on a success, the target can't teleport or summon creatures for 1 minute. On a critical success, the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Atordoado} 1 and can't teleport or summon creatures for 1 hour, and if you are on your home plane and the target is a fiend of level 18 or lower from another plane, it is also banished to its home plane. Your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this attack.

Barbarian Resiliency.name: Resiliência de Bárbaro
Barbarian Resiliency.description:
Pré-Requisitos Dedicação de Bárbaro, sua classe concede no máximo uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida por nível igual a 10 + seu modificador de Constituição

Você recebe 3 Pontos de Vida adicionais para cada talento de classe do arquétipo de bárbaro que possuir. Conforme continuar selecionando talentos de classe de arquétipo de bárbaro, você continuará a receber Pontos de Vida desta forma.

Basic Blood Potency.name: Potência Sanguínea Básica
Basic Blood Potency.description:
Pré-Requisitos Dedicação de Feiticeiro

Você recebe um talento de feiticeiro de 1º ou 2º nível.

Basic Bloodline Spell.name: Magia de Linhagem Básica
Basic Bloodline Spell.description:
Pré-Requisitos Dedicação de Feiticeiro

Você recebe a magia de linhagem inicial de sua linhagem. Se ainda não possuir, você recebe uma reserva de foco com 1 Ponto de Foco, que pode Refocar sem qualquer esforço especial (para mais sobre magias de linhagem, veja a página 194).

Basic Concoction.name: Concocção Básica
Basic Concoction.description:
Pré-Requisitos Dedicação de Alquimista

Você recebe um talento de alquimista de 1º ou 2º nível.

Basic Deduction.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CZXhJS55rG5H6PpB]{Investigator Dedication}

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level investigator feat of your choice.

Basic Devotion.name: Devoção Básica
Basic Devotion.description:
Pré-Requisitos Dedicação de Campeão

Você recebe um talento de campeão de 1º ou 2º nível.

Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.oyLkqhDGwGGj40ME]{Eldritch Archer Dedication}

You gain the basic spellcasting benefits (page 150). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from this archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell level to your repertoire, either a common spell of your chosen tradition or another spell of that tradition you have learned or discovered.

Basic Flair.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eAlrvPVb8qt8Lruw]{Swashbuckler Dedication}

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level swashbuckler feat of your choice.

Basic Fury.name: Furor Básico
Basic Fury.description:
Pré-Requisitos Dedicação de Bárbaro

Você recebe um talento de bárbaro de 1º ou 2º nível.

Basic Kata.name: Kata Básico
Basic Kata.description:
Pré-Requisitos Dedicação de Monge

Você recebe um talento de monge de 1º ou 2º nível.

Basic Mysteries.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OUNj8nXTHwGcEdlh]{Oracle Dedication}

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level oracle feat of your choice.

Basic Red Mantis Magic.name: Magia Básica do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho
Basic Red Mantis Magic.description:
Pré-Requisitostreinado em Religião, Dedicação de Assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho

Você aprendeu magia divina limitada de seu treinamento como Louva-a-Deus Vermelho. Você recebe a atividade Conjurar uma Magia. Você é um conjurador preparado, capaz de preparar dois truques mágicos e uma magia de 1º nível por dia. Você prepara estas magias a partir de um grimório de assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho, similar ao grimório de um mago, contendo três truques mágicos e duas magias de 1º nível. Todas as magias em seu grimório de assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho, deste talento e de posteriores, devem ser magias de ilusão ou transmutação da lista de magias arcanas ou uma magia da seguinte lista: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Bruma Obscurecente}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HXhWYJviWalN5tQ2]{Clariaudiência}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{Clarividência}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Escuridão}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Golpe Certo}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]{Modificar Memória}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralisar} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Porta Dimensional}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{Ver Invisibilidade}. Independentemente da tradição mágica usual da magia, todas as suas magias de assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho são magias divinas, assim como quaisquer magias de foco de Louva-a-Deus Vermelho que você obtiver

Você pode preparar dois truques mágicos e uma magia de 1º nível a cada dia a partir das magias encontradas em seu grimório de assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho. Você é treinado em rolagens de ataque de magia e em CDs de magia para conjurar magias divinas. Seu atributo chave de conjuração para estas magias é Carisma.

1.value: Dedicação de Assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho

Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting.name: Conjuração Básica de Feiticeiro
Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting.description:
Pré-Requisitos Dedicação de Feiticeiro

Você recebe os benefícios de conjuração básica (página 219). Cada vez que receber um espaço de magia de um novo nível do arquétipo de feiticeiro, acrescente uma magia comum da tradição de sua linhagem, uma magia comum da linhagem escolhida ou outra magia que você tenha aprendido ou descoberto ao seu repertório (desde que seja do nível de magia e tradição mágica apropriados).

Bat Form.description:
Frequency once per hour

You can transform into a bat. You gain the effects of a 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form} spell. At 14th level, you can choose to spend two actions instead of one to gain the effects of a 4th- or 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form} spell instead (bat form only).

Battle Planner.description:
Prerequisites expert in Warfare Lore

You are constantly drawing up plans and battle scenarios, assembling strategies and gathered intelligence for later use. When you scout an enemy’s position or receive a detailed report from an ally who scouted the enemy’s position, if you have a clear indication of the number, position, and identities of your potential foes, you can spend 1 minute to come up with a battle plan that takes such potential factors into account and reduces the role luck plays in the equation.

Roll a Warfare Lore check. As long as the information was accurate and remains accurate when you roll initiative against those enemies, you can use the Warfare Lore result you previously rolled for your initiative roll; if you do, this is a fortune effect.

Beast Speaker.name: Orador da Besta
Beast Speaker.description:
Arquétipo Treinador de Animais Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Treinador de Animais

Você constantemente tem o efeito de falar com os animais como uma magia primal inata de 2º nível. Você ganha +2 de bônus de circunstância nos testes de Diplomacia para fazer um pedido de animais enquanto essa magia estiver ativa.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse)

Beastmaster Bond.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wdmUH6hdat7jpEWt]{Beastmaster Dedication}

You can communicate telepathically with your animal companions within 100 feet. If you’re legendary in Nature, you can communicate telepathically with your animal companions anywhere on the planet.

Beastmaster's Trance.description: You can enter a trance that allows you to briefly inhabit the body of one of your animal companions and share its senses. You gain the focus spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5WM3WjshXgrkVCg6]{Beastmaster Trance}. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Become Thought.description:
You shed some of your material form, becoming a being of pure thought. This has the following effects.

  • You gain resistance 10 to physical damage but weakness 5 to mental damage and weakness 10 to any effect that deals damage by targeting the spirit, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast}.
  • You can change your appearance on a whim. This takes a single action, which has the concentrate trait, has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}, and lasts until you change your appearance again.
  • Once per year, when you die, you automatically return to life the next day as long as one living sentient creature on your plane remembers you; the memories enable you to reconstruct yourself from their thoughts. You appear in the vicinity of the creature that remembers you most strongly.

Bellflower Dedication.name: Dedicação da Campânula
Bellflower Dedication.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.gw4J1pXYED71TPWx]{Lavrador da Campânula}
Pré-Requisitos Carisma 14, especialista em Furtividade e Sobrevivência, membro da Rede da Campânula.

Você se dedica a libertar escravos e escoltá-los para a liberdade. Você recebe +1,5 metros de bônus de estado em sua Velocidade. Escolha até outras seis pessoas para serem sua “colheita”. Membros da sua colheita podem usar seu valor de Velocidade para viagem por terra se esse for maior do que o deles. Membros de sua colheita que estejam a mais de 18 metros de você perdem todos os benefícios deste talento (e dos outros talentos do lavrador da Campânula), mas os recuperam imediatamente ao retornar para esta distância. Você pode adicionar ou remover um membro de sua colheita conversando por 10 minutos com ele.

Especial Você não pode selecionar outro talento de dedicação até ter recebido dois outros talentos do arquétipo lavrador da Campânula.

Beneath Notice.description:
You are skilled at hiding from your foes and targets among the common populace. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.e4KB4pSkx2lDBNw3]{Quick Disguise} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.RiuZT3H4QZIIEQXJ]{Slippery Secrets} skill feats.

In addition, while in a crowd, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} a nondescript member of the crowd as a three action activity (one action if you are legendary in Deception)

Blessed Denial.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eBdajOzs8kiJDic2]{Blessed One Dedication}

Trigger An ally within 30 feet would become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}.

You exude peace and protection, lessening a harmful condition as it falls upon an ally. Reduce the value of the condition your ally would take by 1 (to a minimum of 0). If the ally takes more than one condition at the same time, choose one to reduce.

Blessed Sacrifice.description:
Prerequisites Blessed One Dedication

You gain the Protector's Sacrifice domain spell as a devotion spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Blessed Spell.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eBdajOzs8kiJDic2]{Blessed One Dedication}, ability to cast spells from spell slots, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zilwynzk8lIujgZo]{Mercy}

Frequency once per 10 minutes

When you focus your magic on an ally, you can remove harmful conditions.

If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} from a spell slot, and that spell targets only a single ally, you can also attempt to remove a harmful condition from that ally. The condition must be one that could be removed by your Mercy feat, including those granted by later feats such as @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kZdcoaTD849QalR9]{Greater Mercy}.

Attempt a counteract check based on the spell’s DC and level. This effect is in addition to the normal effects of your spell.

Bloodline Breadth.name: Amplitude de Linhagem
Bloodline Breadth.description:
Pré-Requisitos Conjuração Básica de Feiticeiro

Seu repertório é expandido, e você pode conjurar mais magias da tradição de sua linhagem a cada dia. Aumente a quantidade de magias em seu repertório e de espaços de magia que você recebe através de talentos de arquétipo de feiticeiro em 1 para cada nível de magia (exceto pelos seus dois níveis de magia mais altos).

Bloodline Metamorphosis.name: Metamorfose da Linhagem
Bloodline Metamorphosis.description: Você aprendeu a manipular o poder inato da sua linhagem e adaptá-lo às suas necessidades. Ao fazer suas preparações diárias, você pode mudar uma única magia de 9º nível ou inferior por uma do mesmo nível. Você não pode mudar magias que não sejam especificamente garantidas por sua linhagem.

Bloodline Perfection.name: Perfeição de Linhagem
Bloodline Perfection.description:
Pré-Requisitos exemplar de linhagem

Você comanda os poderes definitivos de sua linhagem e tradição. Você recebe um espaço de magia adicional de 10º nível.

Bloodline Resistance.name: Resistência de Linhagem
Bloodline Resistance.description: Seu sangue mágico lhe torna mais resistente a magia. Você recebe +1 de bônus de estado em jogadas de salvamento contra magias e efeitos mágicos.

Bonds of Death.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You have cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Animate Dead} this turn.

You sway with the motions of your spells that animate the dead, channeling your power to sustain two at the same time. You Sustain your previous casting of animate dead, binding the necromantic energy of the two spells together with metaphysical twine. On subsequent rounds, you can Sustain both animate dead spells with a single action to Sustain the Spell. This benefit lasts until either of the spells ends.

Bone Spikes.description:
Sharp shards of bone tear forth from your elbows, wrists, or other parts of your body. For 1 minute, you can make bone spike unarmed Strikes, which deal 1d6 piercing damage and have the versatile S and sweep traits. When you take the Bone Spikes action, you can choose one weapon on your person and duplicate its weapon runes onto your bone spikes (with the exception of any runes that couldn't apply to the bone spears).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.ZsO5juyylVoxUkXh]{Effect: Bone Spikes}

Awakening Your bones grow longer, lashing flexibly at range. While you have bone spikes, you can Interact to give your bone spikes reach 10 feet until the end of the current turn.

Awakening Grooves in your bone spikes form a channel for venom. Your bone spikes deal 1d4 persistent poison damage, which increases to 2d4 at 10th level and 3d4 at 18th level.

Borrow Memories.description:
Knowing how someone thinks makes it much easier to know where they'll be, or even replace them altogether. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9BnhadUO8FMLmeZ3]{Mind Probe} as an innate occult spell once per day, using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

If you cast mind probe on a target you're studying for the purpose of Assuming their Role, and the target fails their save, you can delay the spell from coming into effect until you Assume their Role. When you use the spell this way, you can Sustain it up to 10 times during its duration, asking a question each time. The spell lasts until you ask all 10 questions or are no longer Assuming the Role, whichever comes first. You don't need to Sustain the Spell to extend its duration-only when asking a question-nor do you need to be in range or have line of effect to Sustain it.

Borrow Time.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger Your turn begins.

You reach ahead and make use of time that's yet to be. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike. You gain this extra action immediately and can use it this turn. At the end of your turn, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Atordoado 1}.

Bound in Ice.description:
You become a hybrid of your ancestry and a saumen kar. Your size increases to Large, and your reach becomes 10 feet. Your cold resistance increases to be equal to your level, and you gain fire resistance equal to half your level.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.a47Npi5XHXo47y49]{Blizzard Evasion} reaction.

Bristle.description:
You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance to AC until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.4Zj71naHbY6O9ggP]{Effect: Bristle}

Special If you have the Barbed Quills reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

Note: +1 to Barbed Quills is not automated

Brutal Critical.name: Crítico Brutal
Brutal Critical.description: Seus acertos críticos são particularmente devastadores. Em um acerto crítico com um Golpe corpo a corpo, acrescente um dado de dano extra. Este dado é adicionado a quaisquer dados extras recebidos por uma arma fatal ou mortal. O alvo também sofre dano persistente de sangramento igual a dois dados de dano.

Bullying Staff.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Acrobata de Cajado} Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Acrobata de Cajado Requirementos Você está empunhando seu cajado.

Você pode tentar @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Empurrar} ou @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Derrubar} criaturas até dois tamanhos maiores que você. Se você tiver proficiência mestre com seu cajado, pode tentar Empurrar ou Derrubar criaturas até três tamanhos maiores que você.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse)

Burning Spell.description:
You enhance your spell with elemental fire, causing it to set the target on fire.

If the next action you use is to Cast a non-cantrip Spell that deals damage at a single target, the spell deals additional @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} equal to the spell level, in addition to its other effects. This has no effect if the spell already deals persistent fire damage.

The spell gains the fire trait.

Butterfly Blade Dedication.description:
Access Defeat a member of the Butterfly Blades in a sanctioned bout.

You become trained in Deception and Stealth; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with butterfly swords. You gain access to butterfly swords.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.vKuJVojicBmNsL1C]{Butterfly Blade} archetype.

Butterfly's Sting.description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.j1JE61quDxdge4mg]{Sneak Attack} class feature. You don't increase the number of dice as you gain levels.

Captivator Dedication.description:
Your ability to captivate others borders on the preternatural. You are seldom at a loss in social situations, and you can create minor enchantments or illusions. Choose Deception or Diplomacy. You become trained in that skill, or become an expert if you were already trained.

Choose two cantrips from the occult list; each cantrip must be from either the enchantment or illusion school. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity and can cast these spells as occult innate spells. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs. If you have a hand free, you can usually replace material components with somatic components, so you don't need to use a spell component pouch. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.b7oePIMEMdFFS5TH]{Captivator} archetype.

Cartwheel Dodge.description:
Requirements You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} or overburdened.

Trigger You succeed or critically succeed at a Reflex saving throw.

You Step up to 10 feet.

Cavalier's Banner.description:
Requirements You have pledged your service to a specific organization or ideal (see Cavalier Pledges, below).

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.xDT10fUWp8UStSZR]{Effect: Cavalier's Banner}

CAVALIER PLEDGES

Many cavaliers pledge themselves in service to a specific organization or individual, such as a noble family or sovereign ruler, a knightly order or another organization, or a particular ideal. A cavalier pledged to an order or ideal must uphold its edicts and is beholden to any anathema it has; for example, a cavalier pledged to the druid's animal order would be tied to that anathema, while a cavalier pledged to the church of Abadar would be held to the same standards as a cleric of that god. If you pledge yourself to an entity or cause without a stated anathema, you should work with your GM to determine the edicts and anathema associated with your pledge.

Cavaliers who have pledged themselves can gain access to certain abilities related to that pledge, such as Cavalier's Banner. If you violate the anathema of your pledge, you lose access to those feats until you benefit from an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual. Changing the subject of your pledge is equivalent to retraining a class feature.

Ceremony of Aeon's Guidance.description: Your patron aeon has allowed you to call upon their gifts to serve their ends. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm Emotions} each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

Ceremony of Aeon's Shield.description: Your patron aeon graced you with powers of protection. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.d7Lwx6KAs47MtF0q]{Shield Other} each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

Ceremony of Fortification.description: Your exoskeleton arranges itself into an optimal defensive shape. When you use your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.VSINzKESKAw2zA20]{Ceremony of Protection}, you also gain resistance to either bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage equal to half your level against the next Strike that hits you and deals one of those types of damage until the start of your next turn.

Ceremony of Growth.description:
You can alter your exoskeleton's size. You constantly gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}. You can dismiss or resume these effects as an action, which has the concentrate trait.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.sPCWrhUHqlbGhYSD]{Spell Effect: Enlarge}

Ceremony of Knowledge.description: You tap into aeon knowledge. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.9jGaBxLUtevZYcZO]{Untrained Improvisation} general feat. In addition, you can attempt skill actions that normally require you to be trained, even if you are untrained.

Ceremony of Protection.description:
You manipulate your exoskeleton to overlap itself. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.9kNbiZPOM2wy60ao]{Effect: Ceremony of Protection}

Champion Resiliency.name: Resiliência de Campeão
Champion Resiliency.description:
Pré-Requisitos Dedicação de Campeão, sua classe concede no máximo uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida por nível igual a 8 + seu modificador de Constituição

Você recebe 3 Pontos de Vida adicionais para cada talento de classe do arquétipo de campeão que possuir. Conforme continuar selecionando talentos de classe de arquétipo de campeão, você continuará a receber Pontos de Vida desta forma.

Champion's Reaction.name: Reação de Campeão
Champion's Reaction.description:
Pré-RequisitosDedicação de Campeão

Você pode usar a reação de campeão associada com sua causa.

Change of Face.description: You know that for the best disguise to work, one requires not only the right skills but also the right look-luckily you can copy both using special magical techniques. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate}, you don't need a disguise kit; instead, simple illusions or temporary transmutations ripple over your body like mirror shards, providing the supplies that the kit ordinarily would. When you Impersonate in this way, your Impersonate activity gains the occult trait.

Channel Rot.description: You've learned to channel your curse through weapons you wield instead of solely through your flesh. The benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.5Pj6pQ7N1qXCQLal]{Accursed Touch} apply to any melee weapon you wield instead of only your fist Strikes.

Chemical Purification.description:
Frequency once per round

Trigger You use Quick Alchemy to craft an alchemist's fire or ghost charge, and that bomb's level is at least 2 levels lower than your advanced alchemy level.

You developed a method to chemically purify and consecrate your bombs on the fly. You include this additive mixture when crafting your alchemist's fire or ghost charge. The created bomb deals [[/r 1d4[persistent,positive]]] damage in addition to whatever damage it would normally cause. As usual for positive damage, this damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing.

Chronocognizance.description: The flows and ebbs of time are obvious to you, as are the tangles that form when it's distorted. You're automatically aware if any creature that you observe is under the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} conditions. You have a general idea when you're in the vicinity of time-manipulating phenomena, though this grants you no particular insight into the specific effects of the anomaly. Particularly subtle temporal anomalies might still escape your notice, requiring a Perception check, as determined by the GM. If you're legendary in Arcana, Nature, or Occultism, or Religion, whenever a creature that you can observe gains the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1dsahW4g1ggXtypx]{Time Stop} or similar effects, you can observe what happens during the stopped time, though you still can't act yourself for the duration.

Chronomancer's Secrets.description:
The secrets of time peel back, revealing deeper truths. You gain either the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.cOwSsSXRsBaXUvlr]{Stasis} domain spell or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.s3LISC5Z55urpBgU]{Path of Least Resistance} focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

Special You can take this feat a second time, gaining the focus spell that you didn't gain the first time. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

Climbing Claws.description: You can extend your claws to aid you in climbing. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet.

Clinch Strike.description:
Trigger A creature you had @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} successfully Escapes.

Your opponents can't slip your grasp without receiving further punishment. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the triggering creature.

Clockwork Reanimator Dedication.description:
You can animate corpses through cunning engineering. You gain a prototype construct companion to serve as a minion. Unlike normal construct companions, yours is a corpse animated by clockwork gears and technological prowess.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.6DgCLFEGEHvqmy7Y]{Clockwork Reanimator} archetype. If you retrain out of this feat, you lose the rituals learned from it.

Clone-Risen.description: You were formed from a clone ritual or alchemical experiment. Created as a vessel for another creature, you can suppress your sentience momentarily, making your mind harder to alter. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.fL7FhTBcKxMzLBAs]{Empty Vessel} reaction.

Cloud Walk.description: Your growing link to cloud dragons has granted you the ability to walk on clouds. Once per hour, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk} on yourself as an innate arcane spell, but only to walk on clouds or fog.

Coffin Bound.description:
You bind your spirit to a coffin filled with soil of your homeland, making it a place of recovery. If you rest inside your coffin for 10 minutes, you regain Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier x half your level. You can still be healed in other ways during that time, though you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} and therefore unable to heal yourself. The GM might allow you to Refocus while resting, depending on whether it's a type of Refocusing you can achieve while you slumber.

If you would be destroyed, you instead remain near death. This doesn't change your dying or wounded value, and you remain unconscious. After 1 hour, you're destroyed. If returned to your coffin before that hour is up, you avoid destruction; if you spend 1 hour resting in your coffin, you regain 1 HP and lose the dying and wounded conditions. You can't be healed in any other way when near death.

Your coffin can't heal you if you're staked through the chest. You can be staked only if unconscious, and it takes three actions. You lose all benefits of this feat if your coffin is destroyed or the soil is lost. You must procure a new coffin and fill it with soil of your homeland to restore the feat's function.

Collapse.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger An enemy's Strike against you is a critical hit.

You collapse into a pile of bones, mitigating the worst of the damage you would have taken, and the triggering attack deals only the amount it would deal on a hit (typically full damage instead of double damage). Any other effects caused by a critical hit still occur. While collapsed, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and can't act except to Stand, which re-forms you into a skeleton in a standing position.

Combination Finisher.description: You combine a series of attacks with a powerful finishing blow. Your finishers’ Strikes have a lower multiple attack penalty: –4 (or –3 with an agile weapon) if it’s the second attack on your turn, or –8 (or –6 with an agile weapon) if it’s the third or subsequent attack on your turn, instead of –5 and –10, respectively.

Come and Get Me.name: Venha me Pegar
Come and Get Me.description: Você abre sua guarda a ataques de forma que possa retaliar fortemente. Até sua fúria encerrar, você fica desprevenido, e rolagens de dano contra você recebem +2 de bônus de circunstância. Qualquer criatura que lhe atingir fica Desprevenida contra seus ataques até o final do seu próximo turno. Se acertá-la antes do final de seu próximo turno, você recebe Pontos de Vida temporários igual ao seu modificador de Constituição (o dobro disso em um acerto crítico). Estes Pontos de Vida temporários duram até o final de sua fúria.

Command Corpse.description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xYakFeP6olBsxpZN]{Command Undead} feat, but you can use it only to transform the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spells you cast on mindless undead. These spells can control creatures with a level equal to or lower than your level -1 (instead of your level - 3).

Communal Tale.description: Stories are an experience meant to be shared as a group. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spin a Tale}, you can designate up to six non-minion allies as the heroes of your story. Each hero, once during the tale, can continue the story in your stead by spending an action to Spin the Tale; if they do, the story continues for another round, as if you had Spun the Tale at the start of your turn. This could allow the story to continue for up to 6 additional rounds, if all possible allies Spin the Tale, though you can continue to Spin the Tale on your own as normal.

Concealing Legerdemain.description:
Prerequisites trained in Thievery

Rather than hide an object somewhere the inspectors won’t search, you’re skilled at keeping the object on the move so it’s never where they look.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{Conceal an Object} of light Bulk or less, you can use Thievery instead of Stealth for your checks and for the DC of an active searcher’s Perception check. You roll the check only once, but you must continue to use actions to Conceal an Object throughout the process.

Conrasu Weapon Expertise.description: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vlnzTSsRmWeSkt9O]{Glaive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aXuJh4i8HqSu6NYV]{Longspear}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}, and all conrasu weapons(@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7WRzbBTOCsJx5f7L]{Buugeng}) in which you are trained.

Conrasu Weapon Familiarity.description: You have taken it upon yourself to learn the ways of combat to aid with your tasks, perhaps in a role as a corrector. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vlnzTSsRmWeSkt9O]{Glaive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aXuJh4i8HqSu6NYV]{Longspear}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbow}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}. You also gain access to all uncommon conrasu weapons(@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7WRzbBTOCsJx5f7L]{Buugeng}). For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial conrasu weapons are simple weapons and advanced conrasu weapons are martial weapons.

Conrasu Weapon Understanding.description: You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself. Whenever you critically hit using a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.e4NwsnPnpQKbDZ9F]{Composite Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vlnzTSsRmWeSkt9O]{Glaive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aXuJh4i8HqSu6NYV]{Longspear}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hIgqLgH3YcLZBeoT]{Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{Spear}, or a conrasu weapon(@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7WRzbBTOCsJx5f7L]{Buugeng}), you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Constant Levitation.description: Your power has unbound you from the earth below. You're affected by a constant @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly} spell, and when your Psyche is Unleashed, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed.

Contortionist.description:
Prerequisites Acrobat Dedication

You can squeeze out of tight situations surprisingly quickly, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down. You gain the Quick Squeeze skill feat, and if you’re a master in Acrobatics, you can Squeeze at full Speed.

Whenever you successfully Escape using Acrobatics, the creature you Escaped from is Flat-Footed against the next attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.

Coordinated Charge.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MYzRfNExDYp25rro]{Marshal Dedication}

You heroically dash into the fray, inspiring your allies to follow. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} up to your Speed and make a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}. If your Strike hits and damages an enemy, each ally within 60 feet who saw you hit can use a reaction to Stride, but they each must end their Stride closer to the creature you hit than where they started.

Coordinated Distraction.description:
Access Help either the Washboard Dogs or the Diobel Sweepers destroy their rival.

With a sharp whistle or wave of your hands, you distract an opponent from the fact that one of your allies is about to attack them. Choose a target and an ally, both of whom must be within 30 feet. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the first Strike the ally makes on their next turn; if your ally doesn't Strike that target, the effect is lost. Depending on how you describe your distraction, this action gains either the auditory or visual trait.

Corpse Tender Dedication.description:
You have a connection to mindless undead that allows you to communicate your intentions to them on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on mindless undead and to make very simple @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} of them; their mindless trait doesn't grant immunity to these mental effects. Most mindless undead are likely hostile toward you by default and must be kept at a safe distance to give you time to Make an Impression.

You become trained in Diplomacy; if already trained, you instead become trained in another skill of your choice.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.jFhTp57zO3ej6HDt]{Corpse Tender} archetype.

Corpse Tender's Font.description: You easily tend to the wounds of the dead. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} as a divine innate spell once per day. This spell is heightened to half your level, rounded up. You can target only mindless undead with this spell.

Corpse-Killer's Defiance.description:
Trigger You destroy an undead foe.

You defy Tar-Baphon with every undead you destroy, using your victory to rally your allies. Allies that can see you gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead for 1 round, or a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead for 2 rounds if the undead foe destroyed was a creature of your level or higher.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.3WzaQKb10AYLdTsQ]{Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

Counter Thought.description:
Trigger A creature Casts a Spell with the mental trait.

Requirements You have an unexpended spell slot you could use to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} with the mental trait.

When a foe @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Casts a Spell} that has the mental trait and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own mental magic to disrupt it. You expend one of your spell slots to counter the triggering creature's casting of a spell with the mental trait. You lose your spell slot as if you had cast the triggering spell; this spell slot must be one for which you could Cast a Spell with the mental trait. You then attempt to counteract the triggering spell.

Craft Philosopher's Stone.name: Criar Pedra Filosofal
Craft Philosopher's Stone.description: Sua longa pesquisa deu resultado, culminando na lendária pedra filosofal. Você aprende a fórmula para a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Fv97oB3iEIFAyzTu]{Pedra Filosofal} e pode acrescentá-la ao seu livro de fórmulas.

Crafter's Appraisal.description: Your knowledge of items' construction allows you to discern their magical effects as well. You can use Crafting instead of a skill associated with a magic tradition to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.eReSHVEPCsdkSL4G]{Identify Magic} on magic items, though not on any other sorts of magic.

Crimson Shroud.name: Mortalha Carmesim
Crimson Shroud.description:
Frequência Uma quantidade de vezes por dia igual à sua quantidade de talentos de classe do arquétipo assassino do Louva-a-Deus-Vermelho. Pré-requisitosDedicação de Assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho

Você se envolve em um véu de brumas vermelhas por 1 minuto. Enquanto a mortalha estiver ativa, você adquire cura acelerada igual à metade de seu nível. Você pode Interagir com a mortalha, girando-a ao seu redor para recebe +1 de bônus de circunstância na CA até o início do seu próximo turno. Finalmente, se morrer enquanto a mortalha estiver ativa, você pode escolher fazer seu corpo inteiro desaparecer em uma bruma vermelha, deixando somente seus equipamentos para trás; você faz esta escolha quando ativa Mortalha Carmesim.

prerequisites.value: Dedicação de Assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho

Cross the Final Horizon.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UjEeHamC2C8JfgJz]{Sky and Heaven Stance}
Requirements You are in Sky and Heaven Stance.

You Stride up to your Speed and your ki enshrouds your limbs in a terrifying stormy energy, increasing the reach of your Sky and Heaven Stance unarmed attacks by 5 feet.

At the end of your movement, make up to three Strikes against a target you can reach, each at a –2 penalty. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after you have made all your attacks. Instead of the usual slashing or piercing damage, the damage for these Strikes is either electricity or sonic, as you choose with each Strike. If you successfully hit with all three Strikes, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} 3.

Cross the Threshold.description: You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} as an occult innate spell once per day. You don't need to Sustain the Spell; instead, it lasts for 10 minutes or until you choose to return to your material form as a free action.

Crown of the Saumen Kar.description: Your body begins to evolve and adapt, taking the first steps towards blending your very self with the ancient curse of the saumen kar. You become larger and bulkier, pushing the very edge of height and weight for your size. You gain scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks made to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} in areas of forest and snow. You sprout a pair of horns from your forehead, gaining a horns unarmed attack that deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage. Your horns are in the brawling group and have the shove and trip traits.

Crude Communication.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.u6SDVWbzHnBBPNMo]{Linguist Dedication}

Even if you don’t speak a creature’s language, you can rely on inflection, root words, and body language to infer rudimentary meaning.

If you interact with a creature for at least 10 minutes and that creature can speak a language, the GM rolls a secret Society check with a DC appropriate for the language’s rarity.

On a success, you understand the gist of the meaning and can communicate basic concepts back to the creature; on a failure, you are mistaken or communicate incorrect concepts.

If you’re legendary in Society, you can communicate instantly without needing to attempt a Society check; even if you didn’t know the medium of communication the creature uses (speech, sign language, and so on), you intuit this information as soon as they try to communicate.

Crystal Healing.description:
You know how to stimulate a body's natural healing abilities through the application of resonant crystals. Doing so requires you to use at least two semiprecious stones with a total value of 5 gp or more in place of healer's tools, which allows you to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{Treat Disease} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.KjoCEEmPGTeFE4hh]{Treat Poison} using Occultism rather than Medicine.

If you're an expert in Occultism and you use gems whose total value equals or exceeds 50 gp, you gain a +1 item bonus to your Occultism check. If you're a master and the gems' value equals or exceeds 700 gp, the item bonus increases to +2; if you're legendary in Occultism and the gems' value equals or exceeds 15,000 gp, the item bonus increases to +3.

Crystal Keeper Dedication.name: Dedicação de Guarda dos Cristais
Crystal Keeper Dedication.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.xNzNpPjeNSrXE7WG]{Guarda dos Cristais}
Pré-requisitos treinado em Saber Élfico ou sociedade

Você pode usar Arcanismo, Ocultismo, Religião ou Sociedade para Decifrar Escrita meditando diante de um cristal, independentemente do tipo de escrita. Ao Decifrar Escrita e rolar uma falha crítica, você obtém uma falha e, ao Decifrar Escrita e rolar um sucesso, obtém um sucesso crítico.

Além disso, você ganha resistência 10 a danos causados ​​por perigos associados a cristais.

Especial Você não pode selecionar outro talento de dedicação até ganhar dois outros feitos do arquétipo de Guarda dos Cristais.

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 4)

Crystal Ward Spells.name: Magias de Proteção do Cristal
Crystal Ward Spells.description:
Arquétipo Guarda dos Cristais

Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Guarda dos Cristais

Seu estudo dos cristais e das energias contidas nas facetas de uma gema concede a você magias arcanas especiais de proteção do cristal, que são um tipo de magia de foco. Custa 1 Ponto de Foco para lançar uma magia de foco, e você começa com uma reserva de foco de 1 Ponto de Foco. Você reabastece sua reserva de focos quando faz seus próximos preparativos diários e pode recuperar 1 Ponto de Foco gastando 10 minutos usando a atividade Refocar para pesquisar e memorizar as propriedades de gemas.

As magias de foco são aumentadas automaticamente para metade do seu nível arredondado para cima. Certos talentos podem oferecer mais magias de foco e aumentar o tamanho do sua reserva de foco, embora a sua reserva de foco nunca possa conter mais do que 3 Pontos de Foco. Você ganha a magia de foco @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.57ulIxg3Of2wCbEh]{Proteção do Cristal Eletrificado}, e você é treinado em jogadas de ataque e CDs de magias arcanas. Sua habilidade de lançar magias é Inteligência.

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 4)

Cunning Tinker.description: Time spent tending to your own form has unlocked your ability to fix other things. You can cast 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dINQzhqGmIsqGMUY]{Mending} once per day as an arcane innate spell. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 3 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level. Even though you're alive and not an object, and you can't normally recover Hit Points from effects that repair objects (like the Repair skill), you can target yourself with this innate spell and use it to recover Hit Points.

Cunning Trickster Mask.description: Your mask carries the legacy of Verdant Spider, the Speaker of Needs, allowing you to deceive and outwit your foes. You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} a target from up to 30 feet away, and if you succeed or critically succeed in your Feint attempt, the target of your Feint takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saving throws against your spells until the start of your next turn. If you don't have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.sIeuPW0j39fTZm08]{Conceal Spell} feat, you gain it as a bonus feat, allowing you to disguise your spellcasting from others' eyes. If you already have the Conceal Spell feat, you can use Conceal Spell once per round as a free action instead of as a single action.

Cut the Bonds.name: Cortar os Laços
Cut the Bonds.description:
Arquétipo Lavrador da Campânula

Prerequisites Dedicação da Campânula, especialista em armas corpo a corpo

Selecione um efeito mágico que tenha deixado um membro adjacente de sua colheita agarrado, desajeitado, lento, paralisado ou restringido. Faça um teste de neutralização utilizando seu modificador de ataque (incluindo sua penalidade por ataques múltiplos) com uma arma corpo a corpo com a qual possua proficiência especialista. Seu nível de neutralização é igual à metade de seu nível arredondada para cima. Em um sucesso, você liberta esse membro do efeito mágico; em uma falha, você não pode tentar Cortar os Laços desse efeito no membro da colheita até que tenham se passado 24 horas.

Cycle Spell.description: Your devotion to the cycle of souls grants you an additional divine spell. Choose from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]{Disrupting Weapons}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}. You must make this selection when you take this feat and it can't be changed. Once per day, while your spiral is glowing, you can cast the selected spell as a divine innate spell.

Dancing Leaf.name: Folha Dançante
Dancing Leaf.description: Você é leve como uma folha soprada pela brisa. Quando Saltar ou obtiver sucesso em um Salto em Altura ou Salto em Distância, aumente a distância saltada em 1,5 metros. Quando calcular o dano sofrido por queda, desconsidere qualquer distância que você cair enquanto passar adjacente a uma parede.

Daywalker (Vampire).description: Through a profane pledge or a bloodline quirk, you can tolerate the sun's light. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.YGk41WV42aTM7CQV]{Advanced Undead Benefits} and can't be destroyed by sunlight. This doesn't prevent you from becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} by exposure to the sun.

Deadly Poison Weapon.name: Envenenar Arma Mortal
Deadly Poison Weapon.description:
Pré-requisitos Envenenar Arma Aprimorado

Seus venenos são devastadoramente potentes. Quando você aplica um veneno simples com Envenenar Arma, o veneno causa 4d4 de dano de veneno em vez de 1d4 de dano de veneno. Quando você aplica um veneno de ferimento em sua arma, o CD para resistir a esse veneno aumenta em 2, até o máximo de sua CD de classe.

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 5)

Deathly Secrets.description:
No means of creating or ruling the undead is beyond your grasp, even those of magical traditions not your own. You learn either the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DLFupJuCfzyLCQcO]{Eyes of the Dead} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Cd6Crl4wpQaMSYrF]{Subjugate Undead} focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by meditating over the earthly remains of a dead sentient creature. Focus spells granted by the reanimator archetype are from the same tradition as those used to meet the archetype's prerequisite.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time, you learn a different spell and your focus pool increases by 1 Focus Point.

Deceptive Worship.description:
Prerequisites trained in Occultism

Members of your cult frequently pass themselves off as worshippers of other religions. You can use Occultism instead of Deception to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} a typical worshipper of another faith or to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} specifically to claim you are a member of the faith you are Impersonating.
